name: 2022 7th International Conference on Multimedia Communication Technologies
content: PUBLICATION: ICMCT 2022 is to publish latest & high-quality research works on Multimedia Communication Technologies in theoretical and practical aspects. Submitted papers will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers will be included into ICMCT 2022 Conference Proceedings which will be published by CPS and submitted to Xplore, and indexed by EI Compendex, SCOPUS, etc....
